sentence.Network_en: So thou thinkest the child will love me? "
Yeah, we think so, we think so And dost thou thinkest thine can be stopped?
sentence.Network_cn: 是的, 我们是这样想的! 我们是这样想的!那么你们认为有什么能阻挡我们 吗 ?

auth_sentence.content: Next, we are a step away from a symbol of the bird when the real thing can't be found and a religion is born. What thinkest thou?
